Reviews.Title: Nokia 6710 should have been recalled - it's not a good buy at all
Reviews.Author: ABSOLUTE B. "ABSOLUTE B."
Reviews.Content: I am very disappointed in this purchase....the phone keeps powering down too easily....and when you recharge it and it looks full after just receiving one phone call it goes blank and is gone again.If I had know about this problem with this phone I would have not purchased it at all..Nokia you have disappointed me there....this phone should have been recalled... plus the navigation keys gets easily pressed because of where it is positioned....I am considering buying a new battery for the phone to see if that is the problem....but what if I do and it still does the same thing...First time I bought a phone and it was such a failure....very unhappy customer.
